24.2 Post-Employment Medical Beneﬁts

Lonza’s post-employment medical beneﬁt plans are not funded and are provided under deﬁned-beneﬁt plans. They consist of post—retirement healthcare benefits in the United States, such as drug coverage and other medical beneﬁts, as well as limited death benefits.

The post-retirement healthcare plans are not open to new members and grandfathered participants must meet specific age / service requirements to participate.
